import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import Query from '../../components/utils/query' import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown' import Moment from 'react-moment' import ARTICLE_QUERY from '../../apollo/queries/article' import {ArticlePage, ArticleHeader} from './article_styled.js' const Article = () => { const router = useRouter() return ( {({ data: { article } }) => ( {article.title}

{article.published_at}

) } ) } export default Article
